plays.text: Penalty to Martin Havlat 2 minutes for Hooking Sergei Brylin
Penalty to MIKE COMMODORE 2 minutes for Closing Hand on Puck(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Brian Rafalski 2 minutes for High Sticking Todd White
Goal scored by Mike Fisher assisted by Wade Redden
Penalty to Todd White 2 minutes for High Sticking Bobby Holik
Penalty to Mike Fisher 5 minutes for Fighting John Madden
Penalty to John Madden 5 minutes for Fighting Mike Fisher
Penalty to Mike Fisher 10 minutes for Misconduct John Madden
2 minute Bench Penalty for Instigator served by Martin Havlat
